d.name: v1.5.0-beta.20
d.body:
###    🐞 Bug Fixes

- Remove max validation on siwe verify endpoint  -  by @orshih6 and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8158 [<samp>(84565)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/84565ccc2)
- Dynamic base url auth context should contain all properties of context  -  by @Engerim in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8170 [<samp>(00dfa)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/00dfa4fb3)
- **adapter**: Map camelCase keys during checkMissingFields in Drizzle adapter  -  by @jonathan-teamstatus and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8176 [<samp>(1d7f4)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/1d7f43623)
- **api**: Respect freshAge in deleteUser  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8174 [<samp>(f7a65)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/f7a65b187)
- **client**: Broadcast session updates to other tabs on sign-out and user update  -  by @Abhinav-kodes and **Abhinav-kodes** in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8177 [<samp>(c45ed)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/c45edd6b3)
- **cookies**: Export `getAccountCookie` from `better-auth/cookies`  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8181 [<samp>(6beb0)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/6beb0a136)
- **docs**: Redirect legacy `/docs/errors` routes to `/docs/reference/errors`  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8160 [<samp>(e8a84)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/e8a84726e)
- **nextjs**: Use explicit .js extension in next/headers imports  -  by @Jordanburch101 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8178 [<samp>(f90a5)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/f90a59a7e)
- **two-factor**: Handle undefined options verifyTwoFactor  -  by @okisdev in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8162 [<samp>(49931)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/49931f04c)

#####     [View changes on GitHub](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/compare/v1.5.0-beta.19...v1.5.0-beta.20)

d.name: v1.5.0-beta.19
d.body:
###    🚀 Features

- **api-key**: Organization support in API-Keys & Multiple config support  -  by @ping-maxwell and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/4210 [<samp>(ad3fc)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/ad3fc4cca)

###    🐞 Bug Fixes

- Use invalid_grant instead of invalid_request for refresh token errors  -  by @luchersou in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8103 [<samp>(1129a)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/1129a3061)
- **captcha**: Add `$ERROR_CODES`  -  by @marcellosso in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8136 [<samp>(a187e)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/a187e02d4)
- **electron**: Redirect in oauth init proxy  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8143 [<samp>(0ce23)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/0ce2316ae)
- **expo**: `expo-web-browser` is not installed as a dependency  -  by @AdiMarianMutu and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7752 [<samp>(5fc09)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/5fc093640)
- **multi-session**: Allow setActive with multi-session cookies only  -  by @Oluwatobi-Mustapha in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8121 [<samp>(f48c6)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/f48c66efa)
- **swie**: Remove max chainId validation  -  by @orshih6 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8123 [<samp>(15136)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/151362b16)

#####     [View changes on GitHub](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/compare/v1.5.0-beta.18...v1.5.0-beta.19)

d.name: v1.5.0-beta.18
d.body:
###    🐞 Bug Fixes

- Drizzle transform input crashes dates  -  by @ping-maxwell in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8105 [<samp>(2e1c1)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/2e1c17754)

#####     [View changes on GitHub](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/compare/v1.5.0-beta.17...v1.5.0-beta.18)

d.name: v1.5.0-beta.17
d.body:
###    🚀 Features

- Limit enumeration on sign-up when email verification is required  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8091 [<samp>(3ec7d)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/3ec7d41a9)
- Add `/update-session`  -  by @himself65 and @ping-maxwell in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8084 [<samp>(f2124)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/f2124a8f4)
- **auth**:
  - Support dynamic baseURL with allowedHosts  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8009 [<samp>(19779)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/197792318)
- **cli**:
  - Use vite to load auth config when we detect a vite project  -  by @Bekacru [<samp>(22d23)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/22d238b4b)
  - Use vite to load auth config when we detect a vite project"  -  by @Bekacru [<samp>(d79c0)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/d79c0db73)
- **mcp**:
  - Add framework-agnostic remote MCP auth client  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8087 [<samp>(9fed1)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/9fed16b6c)
- **stripe**:
  - Add `scheduleAtPeriodEnd` option to defer plan changes  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8064 [<samp>(51808)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/5180893ae)
  - Track subscription schedule ID for pending plan changes  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8070 [<samp>(96dc1)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/96dc13a40)

###    🐞 Bug Fixes

- Merge trusted origins function from plugin init  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8056 [<samp>(830bf)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/830bfd251)
- Force drizzle-adapter to return dates correctly  -  by @ping-maxwell in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8104 [<samp>(7565c)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/7565c75eb)
- **admin**:
  - Optional chain `user` in hooks  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8026 [<samp>(62ed6)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/62ed64535)
- **bearer**:
  - Use semicolon separator when merging cookie headers  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8089 [<samp>(b8942)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/b894280a4)
- **db**:
  - Handle camelCase postgres metadata keys in migration schema detection  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8092 [<samp>(cbd86)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/cbd86131d)
- **expo**:
  - Support wildcard trusted origins in deep link cookie injection  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8013 [<samp>(2468a)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/2468a2d91)
  - Delete expired cookies instead of storing empty values  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8090 [<samp>(6f545)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/6f545cad2)
- **phone-number**:
  - Call callback on password reset  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8046 [<samp>(8fe65)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/8fe651400)
- **security**:
  - Prevent OTP reuse via race condition  -  by @Oluwatobi-Mustapha in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8067 [<samp>(664c1)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/664c1d7a9)
- **sso**:
  - Import cjs dep  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8041 [<samp>(425ec)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/425ec38f8)
- **stripe**:
  - Handle line item price replacement on plan upgrade  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8066 [<samp>(9ca0f)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/9ca0fa32a)
  - Inject metadata to schedules on update, not on create  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8069 [<samp>(5eebb)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/5eebbe96a)
  - Use CHECKOUT_SESSION_ID for success_url and remove cancel callback  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8095 [<samp>(e802e)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/e802eaeba)

#####     [View changes on GitHub](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/compare/v1.5.0-beta.16...v1.5.0-beta.17)

d.name: v1.4.19
d.body:
###    🚀 Features

- **adapter**:
  - Improve `select` support  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7667 [<samp>(4aae0)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/4aae092b6)
- **oauth-provider**:
  - Add iss parameter to authorization responses (RFC 9207)  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7669 [<samp>(766fc)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/766fcc8a2)
  - Add configurable rate limiting for OAuth endpoints  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7666 [<samp>(2410d)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/2410d70ee)
  - Enforce HTTPS for redirect URIs  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7670 [<samp>(cf473)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/cf473b2bb)
- **phone-number**:
  - Support user additionalFields in `signUpOnVerification` flow  -  by @bytaesu and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7699 [<samp>(f3080)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/f308056ee)

###    🐞 Bug Fixes

- Skip sending email verification to already verified users without a session  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7712 [<samp>(1667f)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/1667f4b01)
- Improve Headers detection with instanceof check and cross-realm fallback  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7651 [<samp>(1dc6a)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/1dc6a7fe2)
- Safely coerce date values from DB in OAuth provider plugin  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7937 [<samp>(f7074)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/f7074a340)
- Correct error redirect URL construction  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7799 [<samp>(61cc2)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/61cc2a525)
- Encode callbackURL in delete-user verification email  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8007 [<samp>(fab61)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/fab61af71)
- Add error handling for id token verification in Apple and Google providers  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8011 [<samp>(90ffd)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/90ffd2cff)
- **access**:
  - Allow passing statements directly into `newRole`  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7687 [<samp>(9312d)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/9312d9720)
- **adapter**:
  - Use `getCurrentAdapter` for user lookup to avoid transaction deadlock  -  by @sakamoto-wk in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7758 [<samp>(327ee)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/327ee7141)
- **admin**:
  - Change list type from `never[]` to `UserWithRole[]`  -  by @LovelessCodes in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7701 [<samp>(3c0c5)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/3c0c5ad3f)
  - Apply listUsers filter when filterValue is defined  -  by @coderrshyam, @bytaesu and **Taesu** in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7827 [<samp>(5f611)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/5f6112441)
  - Optional chain `user` in hooks  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8026 [<samp>(17407)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/17407ba32)
- **api-key**:
  - Error details not passed to response  -  by @ping-maxwell and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7692 [<samp>(8fd94)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/8fd94d3c8)
- **cli**:
  - Add `.env.local` to dotenv  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7831 [<samp>(e804e)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/e804ef1a6)
- **cookie**:
  - Relax cookie retrieval for `getSessionCookie`  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8008 [<samp>(81f50)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/81f507a92)
- **custom-session**:
  - Use getSetCookie() to preserve individual Set-Cookie headers  -  by @thomaspeklak in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7879 [<samp>(0f035)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/0f035e33e)
- **db**:
  - Infer default value for `required` attr properly  -  by @jslno in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7996 [<samp>(c44a8)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/c44a84ddc)
- **email-otp**:
  - Typo in OpenAPI response metadata  -  by @smsunarto and **Claude Opus 4.5** in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7737 [<samp>(defcb)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/defcb362f)
- **expo**:
  - Construct the new Request to avoid immutable headers error on Cloudflare Workers  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7774 [<samp>(5e83e)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/5e83ebc2f)
  - Avoid a leading “; ” when constructing the first cookie  -  by @Laurin-Notemann in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7821 [<samp>(3f5c1)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/3f5c1a2c1)
  - Support wildcard trusted origins in deep link cookie injection  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8013 [<samp>(7153e)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/7153e1b6d)
- **generic-oauth**:
  - Emit duplicate id warning  -  by @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7779 [<samp>(c682a)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/c682ac860)
- **microsoft**:
  - Add `verifyIdToken` support for Microsoft Entra ID provider  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7795 [<samp>(80120)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/80120ae67)
- **oauth**:
  - Support case-insensitive email matching for social account linking  -  by @karuppusamy-d in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7812 [<samp>(987f4)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/987f4549d)
- **oauth-provider**:
  - Return `url` instead of `uri` in continue and consent endpoints  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7811 [<samp>(fb56f)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/fb56f8726)
  - Add missing oauthClient createdAt/updatedAt values  -  by @dvanmali in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7851 [<samp>(16b11)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/16b11058b)
  - Return "invalid_client" on encrypted secret verification failure  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8030 [<samp>(358a8)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/358a8e380)
- **organization**:
  - Prevent deletion of roles assigned to members  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7736 [<samp>(8d98b)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/8d98bcc0f)
  - Remove unreachable null check in `acceptInvitation`  -  by @Saurav3004, **Taesu** and @himself65 in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7825 [<samp>(3f254)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/3f254979e)
- **passkey**:
  - Compute expirationTime per-request instead of at init  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7731 [<samp>(763fd)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/763fdedb4)
  - Use `deleteVerificationByIdentifier` for secondary-storage cleanup  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7790 [<samp>(6efdc)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/6efdc3832)
- **sso**:
  - Add `better-call` peerDeps  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7676 [<samp>(d323b)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/d323b1a00)
  - Allow custom organization roles in provisioning types  -  by @MuzzaiyyanHussain in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7722 [<samp>(2803e)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/2803e1e8f)
  - Resolve TXT record at verification subdomain instead of root domain  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7935 [<samp>(87093)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/87093e725)
  - Correct IdentityProvider configuration in signInSSO  -  by @theNailz and **Claude Opus 4.5** in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7708 [<samp>(69ea7)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/69ea7fcfe)
  - Fix broken relay state redirect on SAML ACS route  -  by @rbayliss in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7781 [<samp>(68b6b)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/68b6b5d1a)
  - Validate aud claim in OpenID Connect ID tokens  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7816 [<samp>(3cd15)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/3cd159589)
  - Harden SAML ACS error redirects and add regression test for #7777  -  by @Paola3stefania in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7815 and https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7777 [<samp>(a6d8d)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/a6d8de488)
- **stripe**:
  - Restore `better-call` peerDeps  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7675 [<samp>(f63bf)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/f63bfad2e)
  - Use correct `stripeCustomerId` on `/subscription/cancel/callback` endpoint  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/8032 [<samp>(15519)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/155194992)
  - Clarify error when authorizeReference is missing  -  by @bytaesu in https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/issues/7741 [<samp>(91130)</samp>](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/commit/911300458)

#####     [View changes on GitHub](https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/compare/v1.4.18...v1.4.19)
